mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tas_user ( user_id, user_name, user_password, user_gender, user_email_id, user_email_addr, user_addr, user_detail_addr, autority ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userName}, #{userPassword}, #{userGender}, #{userEmailId}, #{userEmailAddr}, #{userAddr}, #{userDetailAddr}, #{autority} )
mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS userId, user_name AS userName, user_password AS userPassword FROM tas_user WHERE user_id = #{userId}
